name: Do the fishing sidequests before you finish the main quest
name_original: Do the fishing sidequests before you finish the main quest
description:
A 1 week proof of concept for Into Games weekly prompts.

The high level concept here was to very rapidly produce an NPC that can spit out randomised stories and activities, that could easily be expanded by a team of contributors.

Plot & Scripting by Thomas Davies
Additional fish and stories contributed by Matt Edwards
